description: Provide seamless access to the Mews hospitality platform API through a standardized interface. Manage customers, reservations, financial transactions, and services inventory efficiently. Enable integration of hospitality management operations into AI workflows with ease.

capabilities.name: getAllAddresses
capabilities.description: Get all addresses associated with specified accounts

capabilities.name: addAddresses
capabilities.description: Add new addresses to accounts

capabilities.name: getAllCustomers
capabilities.description: Get customers with filters. Note: At least one filter must be provided (CustomerIds, Emails, FirstNames, LastNames, LoyaltyCodes, CompanyIds, CreatedUtc, UpdatedUtc, or DeletedUtc). If no filters are specified, defaults to ActivityStates: ["Active"] to return all active customers. IMPORTANT LIMITATIONS: Date range filters (CreatedUtc, UpdatedUtc, DeletedUtc) have a maximum interval of 3 months and 1 day. All array filters have specific maximum item limits (typically 1000, except CompanyIds which is limited to 1).

capabilities.name: addCustomer
capabilities.description: Create a new customer

capabilities.name: updateCustomers
capabilities.description: Updates personal information of existing customers

capabilities.name: deleteCustomers
capabilities.description: Deletes specified customers

capabilities.name: mergeCustomers
capabilities.description: Merges two customers together

capabilities.name: getAllCompanies
capabilities.description: Returns all companies, optionally filtered by criteria

capabilities.name: addCompany
capabilities.description: Adds a new company

capabilities.name: updateCompanies
capabilities.description: Updates company information

capabilities.name: deleteCompanies
capabilities.description: Deletes specified companies

capabilities.name: getAllReservations
capabilities.description: Get reservations with filters. Note: The time interval between StartUtc and EndUtc must not exceed 100 hours.

capabilities.name: addReservation
capabilities.description: Adds a new reservation with the specified details

capabilities.name: updateReservations
capabilities.description: Updates reservation properties

capabilities.name: cancelReservations
capabilities.description: Cancels specified reservations

capabilities.name: getConfiguration
capabilities.description: Returns configuration of the enterprise and the client

capabilities.name: getAllCountries
capabilities.description: Returns all countries supported by the API

capabilities.name: getAllCurrencies
capabilities.description: Returns all currencies supported by the API

capabilities.name: getAllTaxEnvironments
capabilities.description: Returns all tax environments supported by the API

capabilities.name: getAllTaxations
capabilities.description: Returns all taxations supported in tax environments

capabilities.name: getAllLanguages
capabilities.description: Returns all languages supported by the API

capabilities.name: getLanguageTexts
capabilities.description: Returns translations of texts in the specified languages

capabilities.name: getAllBills
capabilities.description: Returns all bills by filter parameters, used for retrieving billing information

capabilities.name: getAllAccountingItems
capabilities.description: Returns all accounting items (charges, payments, etc.) based on filter parameters. REQUIRED: At least one of the following filters must be specified: AccountingItemIds, RebatedItemIds, ClosedUtc, ConsumedUtc, or UpdatedUtc.

capabilities.name: addAccountingItems
capabilities.description: Adds new accounting items (charges, payments, etc.) to customer bills

capabilities.name: addPayment
capabilities.description: Adds a new payment to a customer's bill

capabilities.name: chargeCreditCard
capabilities.description: Charges a credit card and adds the resulting payment to a customer bill

capabilities.name: getAllPayments
capabilities.description: Returns all payments based on filter parameters

capabilities.name: getAllServices
capabilities.description: Returns all services offered by the enterprise

capabilities.name: getAllSpaces
capabilities.description: Returns all spaces of the enterprise, or only those specified

capabilities.name: getAllSpaceCategories
capabilities.description: Returns all space categories of a service

capabilities.name: getAllAccountNotes
capabilities.description: Returns all the account notes associated with the specified accounts within the chain

capabilities.name: addAccountNotes
capabilities.description: Adds new account notes to the system and assigns them to specified accounts

capabilities.name: getAllRates
capabilities.description: Returns all rates (pricing) of the enterprise

capabilities.name: getRatePricing
capabilities.description: Returns prices of rates during the specified period

capabilities.name: exportAccountingItems
capabilities.description: Exports accounting items (charges, payments, etc.) in the specified format and period

capabilities.name: exportReservations
capabilities.description: Exports reservations in the specified format and period

capabilities.name: getAllAvailabilityBlocks
capabilities.description: Returns all availability blocks (reservations blocked by rate, space category, or space) based on filter parameters. Note: At least one filter must be provided (CreatedUtc, UpdatedUtc, CollidingUtc, AvailabilityBlockIds, or ExternalIdentifiers). The time interval must not exceed 100 hours.

capabilities.name: addVouchers
capabilities.description: Adds new vouchers (discount codes, gift certificates) to the system

capabilities.name: getAllTasks
capabilities.description: Returns all tasks of the enterprise, filtered by identifiers or other filters. REQUIRED: At least one filter must be provided (TaskIds, DepartmentIds, ServiceOrderIds, CreatedUtc, ClosedUtc, or DeadlineUtc). LIMITATIONS: Date range filters (CreatedUtc, ClosedUtc, DeadlineUtc) have a maximum interval of 3 months and 1 day. Array filters (TaskIds, DepartmentIds, ServiceOrderIds) are limited to 1000 items each. The Limitation parameter with Count is mandatory for pagination.

capabilities.name: addTask
capabilities.description: Adds a new task to the enterprise, optionally to a specified department

capabilities.name: getAllLoyaltyMemberships
capabilities.description: Returns all loyalty memberships of the enterprise, optionally filtered by specific loyalty membership identifiers, activity states, or other filter parameters. Note this operation uses Pagination and supports Portfolio Access Tokens.

capabilities.name: addLoyaltyMemberships
capabilities.description: Adds new loyalty memberships to the system

capabilities.name: updateLoyaltyMemberships
capabilities.description: Updates information about the specified loyalty memberships. Note this operation supports Portfolio Access Tokens.

capabilities.name: deleteLoyaltyMemberships
capabilities.description: Deletes loyalty memberships

capabilities.name: getAllLoyaltyPrograms
capabilities.description: Returns all loyalty programs of the enterprise, optionally filtered by specific loyalty program identifiers or other filter parameters.

capabilities.name: addLoyaltyPrograms
capabilities.description: Adds new loyalty programs to the system

capabilities.name: updateLoyaltyPrograms
capabilities.description: Updates information about the specified loyalty programs

capabilities.name: deleteLoyaltyPrograms
capabilities.description: Deletes loyalty programs

capabilities.name: getAllLoyaltyTiers
capabilities.description: Returns all loyalty tiers of the enterprise, optionally filtered by specific loyalty tier identifiers or other filter parameters.

capabilities.name: addLoyaltyTiers
capabilities.description: Adds new loyalty tiers to the system

capabilities.name: updateLoyaltyTiers
capabilities.description: Updates information about the specified loyalty tiers

capabilities.name: deleteLoyaltyTiers
capabilities.description: Deletes loyalty tiers
